channel.title: How to: EDIT home, monster, spells. (377 pi, not trisidiax!)
channel.description:
comment: Hey i was wandering if someone knew how to edit the spells - (monster, boss, skill, etc.) so it can be back to normal runescape like this - (lumbridge teleport, camelot teleport, varrock teleport. ETC. revision: 377 pi server: alex isle (not trisidiax, its bad plus everyone uses it.) any more info?: i have client cache serve i can login, I know it is clickingbuttons, and actionhandler.java but i dont know how to edit.
[size=36pt]Luna anwser plz :D <3[/size] [size=14pt]TeamVictory Inc. supports gay marriage![/size]

item.title: How to: EDIT home, monster, spells. (377 pi, not trisidiax!)
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Uhm clickingbuttons is like.
What must happen if the player clicks this object.
for example:

Case 28372; c.sendMessage("You are gay"); break;

This means if you click actionbutton 28372.
It sents an message that you are gay.

Actionhandler is what it must do when you click like an npc.
For example:
case 278:
if(c.cookAss == 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(600, 278);
This means if you click the npcid 278 and your cookAss=0
It will send you a dialogue (which is in dialoguehandler.java)

To change the spell name go into player.java
Search this:

Under that are the spellids and names. I might be wrong since i am on phone

Read full topic

item.title: How to: EDIT home, monster, spells. (377 pi, not trisidiax!)
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Ok go into ur client.
Click the spells and check in ur run.bat what actionbutton it says.
Now search the actionbutton that you want to change in the clickingbuttons.java.
This must be enough information to help you out.
Otherwise tell me
